body.p:
Head-Quarters Military Commander, Louisville.
Louisville, Ky., Jany 25th 18634.
To his Excellency
Gov Bramlett
Sir

I have the honor to recommend Mr John Spaulding, formerly Capt. of Co "G" 15th Regt. Ky Vol Inf, to you as a deserving applicant for a position as secret policeman or detective. Capt S. has during the time he was connected with the 15th Ky shown himself to be a trusty & efficient officer, and was compelled to resign on account of an injury received while in service. His wound is sufficiently well to permit him to perform the above service, but hinders him from becoming a veteran.

I am
Very Respectfully
Your. Obdt. Svt.
S D Bruce Col
20th Ky Vol Inft
Military Commander
